text: Offering can mean any of the following: *An offering is a donation during religious worship. See also alms, tithe, charity, gift and virtue. *An offering can mean a religious sacrifice of plant, animal or human life (blood sacrifice), or a sacrifice of precious things. An offering may also be in money, or may be of a purely spiritual nature, like offering one's heart or life to God (see also Oblation). *An offering, in Buddhism, is a form of prayer.
title: Offering
